urls.description: Spotify Wrapped is the company's viral marketing campaign released every December, showings users see their own personal top songs, artists, and podcasts from that year. Spotify included a new feature: a Myers-Briggs-style "listening" personality type! Mine was "The Devotee," which they describe as a listener who is quick to support new releases and play favorite tracks on repeat…. I think this is a lot more accurate than my regular Myers-Briggs analysis! Spotify also added a tracker of how a l…

.@YouTube will generate ~$30B in revenue in 2022 with only ~7500 direct employees (not incl ad sales and infrastructure)

That’s $4M in rev/employee!

Think that's impressive?

In 2019, Craigslist generated >$1B in revenue with ~50 employees

~$20M of rev/employee! https://t.co/5Ik3vlh47c

@Jason @AnkerOfficial one punch up:

sound dampening (carpet, furniture, panels, drapes) is SO underrated

in most cases, that + mic positioning will have a bigger impact on how you sound than the mic's quality

ie: a $30 mic in a great environment will sound better than a $300 mic in an echoey room

Molly was a leading business and technology reporter in print, radio, and TV for more than 20 years, and was a podcast pioneer before becoming a climate tech investor. If you want to ask a question about your career, your startup or angel investing email askjason@launch.co. Subscribe to This Week in Startups on Apple: https://rb.gy/v19fcp Follow Jason: https://linktr.ee/calacanis Follow Molly: https://twitter.com/mollywood Follow This Week in Startups on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TWiStartups Subscribe to TWiST Clips for the BEST moments: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCS7tJlcUA6PzVHEMo-X7ddg?sub_confirmation=1

Generative AI: next big tech paradigm shift, or a crypto-esque hype bubble?

@Jason thinks Generative AI is the real deal:

1st - they start as toys
2nd - then, they turn into tools
3rd - finally, they become industries and platforms https://t.co/W1j56wHqjI

This could become a vicious cycle:

Layoffs —> Seat Contraction —> Sales Slowdown —> Cut Costs —> Layoffs

Repeat.

FUNDRAISING HACK from @Jason:

Building relationships with investors BEFORE you start raising money will put you way ahead of the game!

2 ways to do that:
1) Concise email updates (charts > words)
2) Build an industry-specific social presence https://t.co/wkicjgIXbd

When you show up for a remote meeting please make sure you come correct:

1. Ethernet not Wi-Fi 🤌 

2. A proper headset w/stick microphone (not AirPods; consider the @AnkerOfficial Power Conference) 🎤

3. A quiet, private room 🤫 

Amazing what a difference these 3 make
